page.title: 09A LOCAL COUNCILLOR
page.content: Mrs Jones has lived in the village for 35 years.She used to live 3 miles out on the A50 down a lonely farm track but she didn't like it very much there.As a local councillor she has to attend a full council meeting every six weeks.She belongs to another two committees which entails another meeting every two weeks and then you are a sub committee councillor which entails another committee.She has been a councillor for 3 years.There are 36 people on the district council.Mrs Jones is also chairman of Husbands Bosworth primary school Governors & she is on the Conservative committee. She takes an interest in the Husbands Bosworth Methodist Chapel also she helps at the Good Companions. And she thinks that she is the longest serving person in the operatic society.
